content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)

### Furnace for iron plate production at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position y1) that processes iron ore into iron plates
- Inserter (position z1) that extracts iron plates from the furnace

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to missing resources
- Ensure that all required sub-ingredients are gathered before attempting to craft an item. For example, stone is required to craft a stone furnace.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity. For instance, ensure you have coal in your inventory before trying to insert it into a furnace.
